paragraphs.text: The cover features artwork of Aang and Momo soaring through the sky.

paragraphs.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender—Coloring Book (ISBN 1-5067-0236-8) is a coloring book published by ${link_0}, featuring forty-five original black-and-white images made by artist Jed Henry. Based on the animated series ${link_1}, the book is produced in collaboration with the creators of the series, ${link_2} and ${link_3}. The artwork is 10" x 10", and each coloring piece is preceded by an accompanying quote of the series. The book was released on October 5, 2016.
paragraphs.text: Avatar: The Last Airbender—Coloring Book (ISBN 1-5067-0236-8) is a coloring book published by Dark Horse Comics, featuring forty-five original black-and-white images made by artist Jed Henry. Based on the animated series Avatar: The Last Airbender, the book is produced in collaboration with the creators of the series, Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko. The artwork is 10" x 10", and each coloring piece is preceded by an accompanying quote of the series. The book was released on October 5, 2016.
